# Loading and checking data

### Amount of rows and columns:

```{r, message=FALSE}

rows <- nrow(gapminder)
cat("\nThe amount of rows are:", rows)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
columns <- ncol(gapminder)
cat("\nThe amount of columns are:", columns)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
tails <- tail(gapminder)
cat("\nHere are a few lines of data:\n")
print(tails)
```
